div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 32 Athens (near the Elissus River), 1929 (100) Burial: 5th cent. B.C.? (T) Contents: AV Persia: darics ("several hundred") Disposition: Athens 8; New York 3 and 34 casts ("king carrying spear") Constantopoulos, A Delt. 1930-1, p. 36 Information from an Athenian correspondent
